body_html:
cc: @dandelionmane
Would you please update the documentation https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/summaries_and_tensorboard
to reflect this change? Thank you very much!
It still states that we can use python -m tensorflow.tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR to launch TensorBoard.
body_text:
cc: @dandelionmane
Would you please update the documentation https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/summaries_and_tensorboard
to reflect this change? Thank you very much!
It still states that we can use python -m tensorflow.tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR to launch TensorBoard.
body:
cc: @dandelionmane
Would you please update the documentation https://www.tensorflow.org/get_started/summaries_and_tensorboard 
to reflect this change? Thank you very much!
It still states that we can use `python -m tensorflow.tensorboard --logdir=$MODEL_DIR` to launch TensorBoard.
